TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {6638=NOTE: All the numbers on this page are for the 2003-2004 election cycle and based on Federal Election Commission data available electronically on August 30, 2006 (for Fundraising totals, Source of Funds and Total Raised vs Average) and on September 15, 2013 for Top Contributors and Industries. In the "Source of Funds" chart, "Large Individual Contributions" refer to all contributions from unique individuals aggregating to more than $200 within a cycle, and "Small Individual Contributions" refer to all contributions from unique individuals totaling $200 or less within a cycle.
